price: 48. Dheh: Rabbigay wuxuu soo diraa Xaqa (oo xumaanta ku tiraa), waa Ogsoonaha sare ee waxaan muuqan (Ghaybka).
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yaqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿallāmu al-ghuyūbi
